name: Kid Shows Of The 80's Quiz | 1980s TV | 10 Questions

questions.text: What series were the characters Starlight, Shy Violet, and Buddy Blue in?
What series were the the characters Rhinokey and Butterbear on?
What was the name of Rainbow Brite's sprite?
What series did the character Sunny appear on?
The characters Cooler, Howler, Bright Eyes, and Whopper were from what cartoon?
What were the names of the villains in Rainbow Brite?
One of the Gummi Bears was a...
The villain in The Wuzzles is what type of animal?
How many colorkids were there on Rainbow Brite?
questions.explanation:
7.

	There was one for each color of the rainbow, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

questions.text: What shape did rainbow Brite have on her cheek?
